title: Top UN refugee official thanks Greece and frontline islands for improved response to continued arrivals ...
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations ) 12 October 2015 - During a two-day mission to Greece - the main European Union entry point for nearly 450, 000 refugees and migrants so far this year - the United Nations' most senior refugee official said he
